triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The paper reviews and systematically analyzes DRL methods as the primary approach for mobile robot navigation.

triples.name: Robot navigation
triples.relevance: Robot navigation is the fundamental problem that the paper addresses using DRL techniques.

triples.name: Obstacle avoidance
triples.relevance: Local obstacle avoidance is one of the four typical DRL application scenarios reviewed in the paper.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Reinforcement learning is the foundational machine learning paradigm that deep reinforcement learning builds upon.
